name: Cool Steel
description: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.
title: trash

name: Dark Iron Sword
description: A perfectly ordinary iron sword, just slightly darker than most.
title: trash

name: Fillet Blade
description: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.
title: trash

name: Harbinger of Dawn
description: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a feel-good buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.
title: trash

name: Skyrider Sword
description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...
title: trash

name: Traveler's Handy Sword
description: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.
title: trash

name: Bloodtainted Great-sword
description: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.
title: trash

name: Debate Club
description: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.
title: trash

name: Ferrous Shadow
description: A replica of the famed sword of Arundolyn, the Lion of Light. Feel the power of a legendary hero as you hold this sword in your hand! Imagine yourself as the great warrior himself! Note: Daydreaming not recommended in live combat.
title: trash

name: Skyrider Greatsword
description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword... for the second time.
title: trash

name: White Iron Greatsword
description: A claymore made from white iron. Lightweight without compromising on power. Effective even when wielded by one of average strength, it is extremely deadly in the hands of a physically stronger wielder.
title: trash

name: Black Tassel
description: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.
title: trash

name: Halberd
description: A polearm with an axe blade mounted on top that can deal quite a lot of damage. It's favored by the Millelith officers.
title: trash

name: White Tassel
description: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.
title: trash

name: Messenger
description: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.
title: trash

name: Raven Bow
description: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.
title: trash

name: Recurve Bow
description: It is said that this bow can shoot down eagles in flight, but ultimately how true that is depends on the skill of the archer.
title: trash

name: Sharpshooter's Oath
description: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.
title: trash

name: Slingshot
description: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to the design, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made what was actually a bow.
title: trash

name: Emerald Orb
description: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue. Small, light, and durable, it is known more colloquially as the jade ball
title: trash

name: Magic Guide
description: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.
title: trash

name: Otherworldly Story
description: A cheap fantasy novel with no value whatsoever. Any claim that it possesses the power of catalysis is also pure fantasy.
title: trash

name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
description: A fictional story of a band of five heroes who go off on a dragon hunt. It is poorly written and structurally incoherent. Its value lies in the many lessons that can be learned from failure.
title: trash

name: Twin Nephrite
description: A jade pendant formed by piecing together two jade stones.
title: trash

name: Favonius Sword
description: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!
title: rare sword

name: Iron Stingd
description: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.
title: forgeable sword

name: Lion's Roar
description: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.
title: rare sword

name: Prototype Rancour
description: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.
title: forgeable sword

name: Royal Longsword
description: An old longsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Exquisitely crafted, the carvings and embellishments testify to the stature of its owner.
title: purchasable sword

name: Sacrificial Sword
description: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
title: rare sword

name: The Black Sword
description: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is said that this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine of slaughter.
title: BP weapon

name: The Flute
description: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.
title: rare sword

name: Blackcliff Longsword
description: A sword made of blackstone. It has a dark crimson glow on its black blade.
title: purchasable sword

name: Festering Desire
description: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with a shriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.
title: event sword

name: The Alley Flash
description: A straight sword as black as the night. It once belonged to a thief who roamed the benighted streets.
title: rare sword

name: Amenoma Kageuchi
description: A blade custom made for a famed samurai who could strike down a tengu warrior, known for their incredible agility, in midair.
title: forgeable sword

name: Cinnabar Spindle
description: A sword made from materials that do not belong in this world. The power within might even be able to withstand the corruption of a venom that could corrode a mighty dragon.
title: event sword

name: Kagotsurube Isshin
description: This famed blade was born in a nation to the far north. But in the name of Isshin, it was stained with many a dark deed on its home-bound journey.
title: quest sword

name: Sapwood Blade
description: It has taken on the shape of a blade that can cut down the foes of the forest.
title: forgeable sword

name: Xipho's Moonlight
description: This ancient double-edged sword glimmers with moonlight. It is said that a now-silent Jinni dwells within it.
title: rare sword

name: Toukabou Shigure
description: A rather special oil-paper umbrella. While long wanderings may make one used to the wind and the rain, there might be some fun in admiring a rainy scene beneath this parasol.
title: event sword

name: Finale of the Deep
description: This longsword is as silent as the mysterious ocean depths. It is even more ancient than its stylings might imply.
title: forgeable sword

name: Fleuve Cendre Ferryman
description: A handy length of abandoned copper pipe that was once used as a weapon. It was famous — or infamous, depending — in some circles.
title: fishing weapon

name: Wolf-Fang
description: Legend has it that this longsword was once used by a wandering knight in the distant past.
title: BP weapon

name: The Dockhand's Assintant
description: A convenient cutting tool that you can rarely find nowadays. You can replace the blades as they are dulled by usage.
title: rare sword

name: Sword of Narzissenkreuz
description: A sword whose power faded when the story ended. It will now embark upon a new journey with the power that remains within it, which commemorates a certain great dream.
title: quest sword

name: Flute of Ezpitzal
description: A peculiarly shaped jade longsword that has been passed down amongst the Masters of the Night-Wind as a priestly flute
title: forgeable sword

name: Sturdy Bone
description: A longsword made of bone that has only grown harder after being hit and swung countless times. It is said that this was the hero Wanjiru's reliable weapon.
title: rare sword

name: Calamity of Eshu
description: A ceremonial blade forged by Sanhaj, the great high priest of the Masters of the Night-Wind. In tales of bygone days, Sanhaj could use this curved blade to perform rituals, blurring the boundary between the Night Kingdom and the present world.
title: event sword

name: Favonius Greatsword
description: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elemental power easily and is highly destructive.
title: rare claymore

name: Prototype Archaic
description: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.
title: craftable claymore

name: Rainslasher
description: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.
title: rare claymore

name: Royal Greatsword
description: An old greatsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. It is made from the finest-quality materials and has stood the test of time. A weapon for use by royals only.
title: purchasable claymore

name: Sacrificial Greatsword
description: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
title: rare claymore

name: Serpent Spine
description: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.
title: BP weapon

name: The Bell
description: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.
title: rare claymore

name: Whiteblind
description: An exotic sword with one section of the blade left blunt. It made its way into Liyue via the hands of foreign traders. Incredibly powerful in the hands of someone who knows how to use it.
title: forgeable claymore

name: Blackcliff Slasher
description: An extremely sturdy greatsword from the Blackcliff Forge. It has a dark crimson color from the blade to the pommel.
title: purchasable claymore

name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
description: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.
title: forgeable claymore

name: Lithic sword
description: A greatsword carved and chiseled from the very bedrock of Liyue.
title: rare claymore

name: Katsuragi­kiri Nagamasa
description: A blade that was once made in Tatarasuna. Heavy and tough.
title: forgeable claymore

name: Luxurious Sea-Lord
description: The great king of the ocean. Having been air-dried, it makes for a fine weapon as well as emergency sustenance.
title: event claymore

name: Akuoumaru
description: The beloved sword of the legendary Akuou. The blade is huge and majestic, but is surprisingly easy to wield.
title: rare claymore

name: Forest Regalia
description: It has taken on the shape of a greatsword that shall cut down the foes of the forest
title: forgeable claymore

name: Makhaira Aquamarine
description: An ancient greatsword that gleams like the waters themselves. A thousand years of sand erosion has not dulled its unnaturally sharp edge one bit.
title: rare claymore

name: Mailed Flower
description: A graceful and elegant greatsword that is decorated with flowers and ribbons.
title: event claymore

name: Talking Stick
description: Most people will find this obsidian-inlaid club quite convincing indeed.
title: BP weapon

name: Tidal Shadow
description: An exquisitely-crafted. standard-model sword forged for the high-ranking officers and flagship captains of Fontaine's old navy.
title: forgeable claymore

name: Portable Power Saw
description: An old-school power saw that you can rarely find nowadays. It was once a cutting tool trusted by workers all around.
title: rare claymore

name: Ul­ti­mate O­ver­lord's Me­ga Ma­gic Sword
description: A magical sword that can only be wielded by the ultimate overlord who rules the seas. As it has been made with special water-resistant materials, it will not get ruined by water damage even after being immersed. Why, one might even call it invincible!
title: event claymore

name: Earth Shaker
description: A heavy blade that people claim was beloved by the hero known as the Firethief. They say that even the Lord of Cinder Keep's flames could not burn it away.
title: forgeable claymore

name: Fruitful Hook
description: Bold Burkina from the Scions of the Canopy once made this weapon with the hero Tenoch's help — all for the sake of obtaining Flamegranates unmatched throughout Natlan.
title: rare claymore

name: Blackcliff Pole
description: A weapon made of blackstone and aerosiderite. There is a dark crimson glow on its cold black sheen.
title: purchasable polearm

name: Crescent Pike
description: An exotic weapon with an extremely long blade on the top and a crescent blade at the bottom. It found its way into Liyue through foreign traders. With practice, it can deal heavy damage.
title: forgeable polearm

name: Deathmatch
description: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.
title: BP weapon

name: Dragons Bane
description: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.
title: rare polearm

name: Favonius Lance
description: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.
title: rare polearm

name: Prototype Starglitter
description: A grudge discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.
title: forgeable polearm

name: Royal Spear
description: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.
title: purchasable polearm

name: Dragonspine Spear
description: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.
title: forgeable polearm

name: Lithic Spear
description: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows no equal.
title: rare polearm

name: Kitain Cross Spear
description: A special lance that was once used by a famed warrior who guarded the Tatarigami on Yashiori Island.
title: forgeable polearm

name: The Catch
description: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.
title: fishing polearm

name: Wavebreaker's Fin
description: A naginata forged from luminscent material deep in the ocean depths. It was once the possession of the tengu race.
title: rare polearm

name: Moonpiercer
description: It is shaped like a giant arrow and can be used as a spear.
title: forgeable polearm

name: Missive Windspear
description: A beacon that shows the direction of the wind. Not every idyll carried on the breeze remains a gentle thing...
title: event polearm

name: Ballad of the Fjords
description: A polearm used by those seeking to catch fish in the tundra. It lets none escape.
title: BP weapon

name: Rightful Reward
description: A sharp spear. Only its tip remains freshly bloodstained.
title: forgeable polearm

name: Prospector's Drill
description: A long-handled drill that you can rarely find nowadays. It was often used in delving and in carving stones.
title: rare polearm

name: Dialogues of the Desert Sages
description: A caduceus symbolizing the glory of alchemy, made from special alloys to match its special status. It is exceedingly rigid and heavy, and would probably hurt pretty bad if used as a cudgel.
title: event polearm

name: Footprint of the Rainbow
description: A keen polearm forged from jade. It gives off rainbow-hued light when exposed to sunlight.
title: fogeable polearm

name: Mountain-Bracing Bolt
description: This polearm was once jointly forged by the craftsmen in the mines as a sacrifice to the spirits of the mountains.
title: rare polearm

name: Tamayuratei no Ohanashi
description: Once upon a time, there was a youkai that roamed Inazuma in the form of a lantern's name. This must once have been one of its vessels.
title: event polearm

name: Compound bow
description: An exotic metallic bow from a distant land. Though extremely difficult to maintain, it is easy to nock and fires with tremendous force.
title: forgeable bow

name: Favonius Warbow
description: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.
title: rare bow

name: Prototype Crescent
description: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.
title: forgeable bow

name: Royal bow
description: An old royal longbow that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Countless generations later, the bowstring is still tight and can still fire arrows with great force.
title: purchasable bow

name: Rust
description: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.
title: rare bow

name: Sacrificial bow
description: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
title: rare bow

name: The Stringless
description: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.
title: rare bow

name: The Viridescent Hunt
description: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.
title: BP weapon

name: Blackcliff Warbow
description: A bow made of blackstone that features extremely sturdy bow limbs. It requires an archer with a strong bow arm to use.
title: purchasable bow

name: Windblume Ode
description: A bow adorned with nameless flowers that bears the earnest hopes of an equally nameless person.
title: event bow

name: Alley Hunter
description: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.
title: rare bow

name: Mitternachts Waltz
description: A bow painted the color of transgression and nights of illusion.
title: rare bow

name: Hamayumi
description: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassing skill, and is both intricate and sturdy.
title: forgeable bow

name: Mouun's Moon
description: A lovely warbow made from seashells and coral. A mournful brilliance flows along its moonlight-colored arms.
title: rare bow

name: Fading Twilight
description: A precious bow made of platinum, inlaid with an orb that shimmers with the light of eventide.
title: event bow

name: End of the Line
description: This seems to be a now-extinct fish. Its body is sufficiently elastic that a string may be attached to it to let it serve as a bow.
title: fishing bow

name: King's Squire
description: It has taken on the shape of a bow that can shoot the enemies of the forest down.
title: forgeable bow

name: Ibis Piercer
description: A  golden bow forged from the description in the story. If you use it as a normal weapon, you can also view it as a part of a fictional world that has made it off the pages.
title: event bow

name: Scion of the Blaz­ing Sun
description: An ancient longbow that is a remnant of King Deshret's ancient era. An indecipherable ancient text and solemn patterns have been carved into it.
title: BP weapon

name: Song of Stillness
description: A strange longbow that resembles a sea creature. Its string makes no sound at all.
title: forgeable bow

name: Range Gauge
description: A measuring instrument that you can rarely find nowadays. It is capable of firing arrows.
title: rare bow

name: Cloudforged
description: A prototype for a standard-issue weapon the Yuheng commissioned from Blackcliff Forge after having analyzed the ancient mechanisms that protected the adeptal abode upon Tianheng.
title: event bow

name: Chain Breaker
description: A jade-adorned longbow. The gentle winds always seem to swirl gently about its string. Legends claim that this weapon was made in a far more ancient era by a dragon artisan.
title: forgeable bow

name: Flower-Wreathed Feathers
description: A longbow that burns like a flame. The feathers that adorn it are said to have come from the ancient tyrant Ngoubou.
title: rare bow

name: Eye of Perception
description: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to reach the purity of one's heart.
title: rare catalyst

name: Favonius Codex
description: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.
title: rare catalyst

name: Mappa Mare
description: A nautical chart featuring nearby currents and climates that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders.
title: forgeable catalyst

name: Prototype Amber
description: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.
title: forgeable catalyst

name: Royal Grimoire
description: A book that once belonged to a royal mage of Mondstadt. It contains faithful and comprehensive historical accounts as well as magic spells.
title: purchasable catalyst

name: Sacrificial Fragments
description: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.
title: rare catalyst

name: Solar Pearl
description: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light of the sun and the moon, and pulses with a warm strength.
title: catalyst from BP

name: The Widsith
description: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.
title: rare catalyst

name: Blackcliff Agate
description: A mysterious catalyst made of blackstone. It has an ominous crimson glow that seems to pulse in synchronization with the tremors from deep within the earth.
title: purchasable catalyst

name: Frostbearer
description: A fruit that possesses a strange, frosty will. A faint sense of agony emanates from it.
title: forgeable catalyst

name: Wine and Song
description: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has become forgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.
title: rare catalyst

name: Dodoco Tales
description: A children's book filled with childish short stories at which one cannot help but laugh. Even those readers who have long reached adulthood cannot help but be absorbed by the innocent, naive little adventures portrayed within.
title: event catalyst

name: Hakushin Ring
description: A catalyst that carries the memory of the Kitsune Saiguu of ancient times. However, this device is but an impoverished vessel for the full breadth of her thought.
title: forgeable catalyst

name: Oathsworn Eye
description: A national treasure of Byakuyakoku stored in the Dainichi Mikoshi. With the coming of the Serpent God, this item was used to notarize great oaths and wishes.
title: event catalyst

name: Fruit of Fulfillment
description: It holds the potential to conquer any crisis.
title: forgeable catalyst

name: Wandering Evenstar
description: This was originally a device used by researchers to observe and perform calculations on celestial phenomena. It serves as a conduit and catalyst.
title: rare catalyst

name: Flowing Purity
description: A strangely-shaped anthology of scripts. All the scripts written by Coppelius are recorded within.
title: forgeable catalyst

name: Sacrificial Jade
description: An ancient jade pendant that gleams like clear water. It seems to have been used in ancient ceremonies.
title: BP weapon

name: Bal­lad of the Bound­less Blue
description: An anthology of exquisite poetry. It contains quite a few poems beloved by Mondstadters, concerning the skies, dandelions, and other such topics.
title: event catalyst

name: Ash-Graven Drinking Horn
description: A ritual vessel passed down amongst the Meztli. They say that this was once a treasure much-valued, yet never used, by the hero Giant Tupac.
title: event catalyst

name: Ring of Yaxche
description: This jade vessel was created by a hero of yesteryear. Legend has it that it once shot the giant dragon that dwelt in the volcano down from the skies.
title: forgeable catalyst

name: Waveriding Whirl
description: A boomerang made from the fangs of a giant sea serpent. It was a rare weapon indeed that the giant Tupac would call trusty.
title: rare catalyst

name: Amber
description: Outrider Amber reporting for duty! Just say the word if you ever need my help!
title: Gliding Champion

name: Barbara
description: Tada! *giggles* Barbara is here~ Leave the healing to me, I will not disappoint you!
title: Shining Idol

name: Bennett
description: This is your team? Cool... I like the vibe. I'm Bennett, leader of Benny's Adventure Team. Any chance we can team up? Please?
title: Trial by Fire

name: Fischl
description: I, Fischl, Prinzessin der Verurteilung, descend upon this land by the call of fate an— Oh, you are also a traveler from another world? Very well, I grant you permission to travel with me.
title: Prinzessin der Verurteilung

name: Kaeya
description: Kaeya, Knight of Favonius. Please allow me to join you on your journey. Guarding you on your journey sounds far more entertaining than any of the usual Favonius stuff.
title: Frostwind Swordsman

name: Lisa
description: Hi darling, are you going to be Lisa's little helper? What? Me, a grand mage? That was a long time ago, I'm just a humble librarian now. *chuckles* Don't worry darling, I'll take very good care of you. So...
title: Witch of Purple Rose

name: Noelle
description: Leave it to me! All of it, whatever it is! ...What... exactly is it? I didn't quite catch your request...
title: Chivalric Blossom

name: Razor
description: I keep watch. You leave, you call me.
title: Wolf Boy

name: Sucrose
description: I'm Sucrose, a researcher of alchemy. I heard you've been to a lot of places, so I was wondering if you... Ah, what am I saying! It's only our first time meeting, I shouldn't trouble you. But... if you're willing, I'd love to hear any stories you have about your adventures. I'd... really like that.
title: Harmless Sweetie

name: Diona
description: My ears and tail are no prop, they're real. Proof of my Katzlein bloodline. It's only weird to you cause you've never seen it before. Wh—Why are you looking at me like that? Fine. You can touch my ears for a second, but the tail is off limits!
title: Katzlein Cocktail

name: Rosaria
description: Listen disciple, if you've got a problem you can't handle, then I'm the one for the job. But if you're looking for prayer, you'd better find some other Sister. ...Huh? You're not a disciple?
title: Thorny Benovolence

name: Mika
description: It's an honor to fight alongside you. If there's anything I can do to support you, just let me know and I'll get to it right away. Anyway, I'll make every effort to navigate us safely and report accurate intel on the enemy!
title: Coordinates of Clear Frost

name: Diluc
description: Diluc, of Mondstadt. Not interested in idle chit-chat. If you have things you want to get done, let me know.
title: The Dark Side of Dawn

name: Jean
description: I am Jean, the Dandelion Knight, requesting approval to join your party. From this day onwards, my honor and loyalty lie with you.
title: Dandelion Knight

name: Mona
description: Fate is called as such, for it cannot be changed, nor can it be reversed. It can only but be accepted.
title: Astral Reflection

name: Venti
description: *Yawn* That was a refreshing sleep. Ah, Traveler, we meet again! What? You don't remember me? Ahaha, well, allow me to join you on your quest once again. I must see to it that the bards of the world tell the Traveler's tales!
title: Windborne Bard

name: Klee
description: Klee was a brave girl today! I found a really weird-looking lizard! Want me to show it to you? *kaboom*
title: Fleeing Sunlight

name: Albedo
description: What a view... How about a quick break so I can sketch this beautiful scenery?
title: Kreideprinz

name: Eula
description: You want to learn some Favonius Bladework? Heh, alright then, I'll teach you.... Oh yes, I'll teach you, alright, mark my words...
title: Dance of the Shimmering Wave

name: Aquilla Favonia
description: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil — just like the last heroine who wielded it.
title: windfalke

name: Skyward Blade
description: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.
title: Himmelsklinge

name: Skyward Spine
description: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's fire resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.
title: Himmelsgrat

name: Skyward Atlas
description: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.
title: Himmelsatlas

name: Skyward Harp
description: A greatbow that symbolizes Dvalin's affiliation with the Anemo Archon. The sound of the bow firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears. It contains the power of the sky and wind within.
title: Himmelsflugel

name: Skyward Pride
description: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.
title: Stolz des Himmels

name: Wolf's Gravestone
description: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.
title: Red Dead of Night

name: Elegy of the End
description: A bow as lovely as any bard's lyre, its arrows pierce the heart like a lamenting sigh.
title: legendary bow

name: Lost Prayer to the Sa­cred Winds
description: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped the wind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence over the millennia.
title: legendary catalyst

name: Song of Broken Pines
description: A greatsword as light as the sigh of grass in the breeze, yet as merciless to the corrupt as a typhoon.
title: legendary claymore

name: Beidou
description: We're setting sail! Men, to your posts! A new adventure is about to begin!
title: Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean

name: Chongyun
description: I take my meals cold to quiet the spirit and calm my vital energies. Qingxin-infused water with ice is the most effective.
title: Frozen Ardor

name: Ningguang
description: We should look for a new investment. Mora doesn't grow on trees.
title: Eclipsing Star

name: Xiangling
description: I can't decide whether Pyro slimes taste better with salt and pepper or garlic and herbs...
title: Exquisite Delicacy

name: Xingqiu
description: I never embark on a journey without a good book to accompany me.
title: Juvenile Galant

name: Xinyan
description: Xinyan's the name, an' rock 'n' roll's the game — and I'm the only one who plays it in Liyue Harbor. Been thinking about staging concerts elsewhere lately, but... Hmm... Well, word is that you've been all over the place, Traveler. So, what say you sign me up for your world tour? Anywhere's good!
title: Blazing Riff

name: Yanfei
description: I'll remind you again: The law can be both a help and a hindrance.
title: Wise Innocence

name: Yun Jin
description: How gently do the clouds and flowers sway, as dancing winds meander through the vales.
title: Stage Lucida

name: Yaoyao
description: Don't put off until tomorrow what you can do today! C'mon, let's get a move on!
title: Burgeoning Grace

name: Gaming
description: Boom-boom tsh, and eyes! And boom-boom tsh, and mouth! And... hmm... I need to tighten up that part.
title: Leonine Vanguard

name: Lan Yan
description: Oh, my plan for the day? Hm... Doing whatever I feel like, I suppose! Same with tomorrow, and the day after that, hehe.
title: Spring Woven From Jade

name: Keqing
description: Come on. Enough procrastinating. Let's go.
title: Driving Thunder

name: Qiqi
description: Hey, do you know what? Uhh... neither do I. I... already forgot.
title: Icy Resurrection

name: Zhongli
description: Osmanthus wine tastes the same as I remember... But where are those who share the memory?
title: Vago Mundo

name: Vortex Vanquisher
description: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.
title: legendary polearm of Rex Lapis

name: Ganyu
description: Should we really be off work this early? There is still a lot left to do...
title: Plenilune Gaze

name: Amos Bow
description: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires, the more powerful it is.
title: legendary bow

name: Xiao
description: If you awake to a knife at your throat, if monsters dig their claws into you, if death comes knocking at your door, call out my name. Adeptus Xiao. I will be here when you call.
title: Vigilant Yaksha

name: Pri­mor­di­al Jade Winged-Spear
description: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.
title: legendary polearm

name: Hu Tao
description: Hu as in 'Who put me in this coffin?' and Tao as in 'I can't geT OUt!' Hehe... No, not funny?
title: Fragrance in Thaw

name: Staff of Homa
description: A firewood staff that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.
title: legendary polearm

name: Shenhe
description: Mind be purged, world be saved.
title: Lonesome Transcendence

name: Calamity Queller
description: A keenly honed weapon forged from some strange crystal. Its faint blue light seems to whisper of countless matters now past.
title: legendary polearm

name: Yelan
description: Huh? What's that look on your face for? You don't have to be on guard around me. I never scheme against people who have my stamp of approval.
title: Valley Orchid

name: Aqua Simulacra
description: This longbow's color is unpredictable. Under the light, it takes on a lustrous, watery blue.
title: legendary bow

name: Baizhu
description: *huffing* When on the road, one should take ample time to pause and appreciate the wondrous scenery along the way.
title: Beyond Mortality

name: Jadefall's Splendor
description: A ritual vessel carved from jade that reflects the luster of the skies and the clear waters.
title: legendary catalyst

name: Xianyun
description: What? A cursory change in one's appearance, and you barely recognize me? Hah, then let one dispel any doubt — one is in all things unconstrained and unabashed, free to live as one pleases, go where one desires, and journey with whomsoever one wishes. Nevertheless, ahem... In light of one's considerable renown... please call me Xianyun in public.
title: Passerine Herald

name: Crane's Echoing Call
description: A fan carved from pure jade, around which swirls an ancient aura of adeptal energy.
title: legendary catalyst

name: Memory of Dust
description: A stone dumbbell containing distant memories. Its endless transformations reveal the power within.
title: legendary catalyst

name: The Unforged
description: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgeless claymore seems to possess divine might.
title: legendary claymore

name: Summit Shaper
description: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.
title: legendary sword

name: Primordial Jade Cutter
description: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.
title: legendary sword

name: Sayu
description: Sayu, Shuumatsuban, at your disposal! Whew, but if you don't need me right now, I'm gonna grab some sleep. Nope, no need to tuck me in — I need the extra room to grow into.
title: Mujina Ninja

name: Kujou Sara
description: Listen. Thunder speaks the will of the Almighty Shogun.
title: Crowfeather Kaburaya

name: Thoma
description: Lovely weather we're having! Will you join me for a walk?
title: Protector From Afar

name: Gorou
description: A strong body shows strength and instills confidence in others around you. I must always stay at the top of my game!
title: Canine Warrior

name: Kuki Shinobu
description: Just let me know if you ever find yourself in a pinch. I can help you out.
title: Mender of Tribulations

name: Shikanoin Heizou
description: Ooh, my goodness, life's really put you through the wringer recently, hasn't it? I can tell. Here, why don't you take a seat, tell me the whole story.
title: Analytical Harmony

name: Kirara
description: I wonder what's inside this package... No no no, no peeking at my customer's stuff...
title: Cat Upon the Eaves

name: Kaedehara Kazuha
description: Wherever in this world I roam, I carry memories of my home... This blade... It is the last link I have to the land of my birth.
title: Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves

name: Freedom-Sworn
description: A straight sword, azure as antediluvian song, and as keen as the oaths of freedom taken in the Land of Wind.
title: legendary sword

name: Kamisato Ayaka
description: I only wish life could be as leisurely as this a little more often... How greedy of me.
title: Frostflake Heron

name: Mistsplitter Reforged
description: A sword that blazes with a fierce violet light. The name Reforged comes from it having been broken once before.
title: legendary sword

name: Yoimiya
description: Let's have a game of rock paper scissors! On my count, now — rock, paper, scissors! Woohoo, I won! I won! ... Hmm? I didn't change my choice halfway. Why would I ever do that?
title: Frolicking Flames

name: Thundering Pulse
description: A longbow that was a gift from the Shogun. Eternal lightning crackles all around it.
title: electro bow

name: Raiden Shogun
description: No salutations needed. My exalted status shall not be disclosed as we travel among the common folk. I acknowledge that you are a person of superior ability. Henceforth, you will be my guard. Worry not. Should any danger arise, I shall dispose of it.
title: Plane of Euthymia

name: Engulfing Lightning
description: A naginata used to cut grass. Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...
title: legendary polearm

name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
description: Respect must be given to the will of every creature. Each fish in the ocean swims in its own direction.
title: Pearl of Wisdom

name: Everlasting Moonglow
description: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.
title: legendary catalyst

name: Arataki Itto
description: Arataki Numero Uno Itto, here in the flesh! Hahaha... *cough*
title: Hanamizaka Heroics

name: Redhorn Stone­thresher
description: According to its previous owner, this weapon is the Mighty Redhorn Stoic Stonethreshing Gilded Goldcrushing Lion Lord that can send any monster packing with its tail between its legs.
title: legendary claymore

name: Yae Miko
description: The moon is simply magnificent tonight. We mustn't squander it. Come, join me for a moonlight stroll — I won't take no for an answer.
title: Astute Amusement

name: Kagura's Verity
description: The bells used when performing the Kagura Dance, blessed by the Guuji herself. The scent of the Sacred Sakura tree lingers on it.
title: legendary catalyst

name: Kamisato Ayato
description: Variety is the spice of life. In that sense, the Milk Tea Medley they started serving over in Hanamizaka recently isn't half bad. You should try it sometime.
title: Pllar of Fortitude

name: Haran Geppaku Futsu
description: A famed work by the Futsu line of smiths. The name Haran comes from the manner in which it resembles the violent, roiling waves.
title: legendary sword

name: Chiori
description: It's up to me to decide who I want to be and to cut my own path. No one can tell me what to do.
title: The Thundering Seamstress

name: Uraku Misugiri
description: This famous blade was once created by the hand of Urakusai, the renowned literato. Legend has it that it has never cut any living creature in all these hundreds of years.
title: legendary sword

name: Yumemizuki Mizuki
description: That dream last night tasted wonderful. Thank you for sharing it with me.
title: Embrace of Enchanting Dreams

name: Sunny Morning Sleep-In
description: A bell lantern forged from purple jade. They say it brings sweet dreams when placed beside one's pillow.
title: legendary catalyst

name: Collei
description: Trainee Forest Ranger Collei, reporting for duty! I will ensure your safe passage through this forest. ...Phew, I think I've finally got that line down! ...I—I didn't get any of it wrong, did I?
title: Sprout of Rebirth

name: Dori
description: I love Mora, and Mora loves me! I make Mora, and it makes me happy! Lalala...
title: Treasure of Dream Garden

name: Candace
description: A shield is not enough to protect the most important things. That's why I must also wield a spear.
title: Golden Yow

name: Layla
description: *groan* ...Why do I have to write so many papers, whyyy...
title: Fantastical Evening Star

name: Faruzan
description: Hm? What did you say? I'm old now, so every other phrase escapes my ears. Try calling me Madam Faruzan, and I'll see if I can pick that up.
title: Enigmatic Machinist

name: Kaveh
description: The ability to appreciate beauty is an important virtue.
title: Empyrean Reflection

name: Sethos
description: If you're always asking 'Why?', you end up thinking yourself into a corner. Sometimes, it's better to let go.
title: Wisdom's Measure

name: Tighnari
description: Don't be afraid to make mistakes. It's all part of the learning process.
title: Verdant Strider

name: Hunter's Path
description: This gilded bow was made using precious white branches. It has felled countless wicked beasts attempting to infiltrate the woods.
title: legendary bow

name: Cyno
description: I do try to lighten the mood sometimes, but... I'm not the best judge of other people's sense of humor.
title: Judicator of Secrets

name: Staff of the Scarlet Sands
description: One of a paired set of scepters fashioned from obsidian. Legend has it that these staves grant the right to lead the people of the desert, but no retainer now lives who can verify the proper appearance of these regalia.
title: legendary polearm

name: Nilou
description: First get into position like this, then move like that... Yep, that's it.
title: Dance of Lotuslight

name: Key of Khaj-Nisut
description: One of a paired set of scepters fashioned from obsidian. They say that this can be used as a key to open the gate to a paradise that lies at the end of the ocean of sand.
title: legendary sword

name: Nahida
description: Something on your mind again? Let's work through it together. Two heads are better than one.
title: Physic of Purity

name: A Thousand Floating Dreams
description: This lamp illuminates the dreams that float up over a thousand nights, and in its emerald-green light flows a song of ancient days.
title: legenddary catalyst

name: Wanderer
description: You think I've got a sharp tongue? I just tell it like it is. If someone can't handle it, maybe that's their problem
title: Eons Adrift, former Fatui Harbinger

name: Tulaytullah's Remembrance
description: A bell crafted of deep sapphire and sterling silver. Its echoes are as crisp as they are distant.
title: legendary catalyst

name: Alhaitham
description: Book learning alone is not enough to cultivate intelligence. All those scholars in the Akademiya are prime examples.
title: Admonishing Instruciton

name: Light of Foliar Incision
description: This gilded blade was made using precious white branches. It was once used to destroy countless poisons that infested the forest.
title: legendary sword

name: Dehya
description: We mercs have one simple rule: Whoever pays the most is your new boss.
title: Flame-Mane

name: Beacon of the Reed Sea
description: A large, flat-tipped sword designed in to fit as the weapon of an ancient king or some ceremonial instrument.
title: legendary claymore

name: Lynette
description: Entering Standby Mode... I hope nobody disturbs me.
title: Elefance in the Shadows

name: Freminet
description: I want to spend some time at the bottom of the sea... In peace and total silence.
title: Yearning for Unseen Depths

name: Charlotte
description: If you keep your eyes peeled and your mind engaged, you'll find there's always a news story nearby just waiting to be discovered.
title: Lens of Verity

name: Chevreuse
description: The musket is my favorite weapon. It's both powerful and threatening... sometimes the latter trait is far more useful.?
title: Executor of Justice

name: Lyney
description: This is no time for distractions! Seriously, you have a great magician standing right here... You don't want to miss the best part, do you!?
title: Spectacle of Phantasmagoria

name: The First Great Magic
description: A stage prop once used by a past Great Magician. Its final secret was that it was also a weapon beyond the pale.
title: legendary bow

name: Neuvillette
description:
Greetings. I am the Chief Justice, or Iudex of Fontaine, but you may simply address me by using my surname, Neuvillette. Not because I wish to keep my distance from you... No, I am merely conscious that being overly familiar may bring the impartiality of the judiciary into question in some people's eyes.
 Oratrice Mecanique d'Analyse Cardinale.
title: Ordainer of Inexorable Judgement

name: Tome of the Eternal Flow
description: A manual that was once passed down from generation to generation within an underwater priory. Today, none know of its existence.
title: legendary catalyst

name: Wriothesley
description: Please excuse me, I'm gonna brew a cup of tea.
title: Emissary of Solitary Iniquity

name: Cashflow Supervision
description: A floating device that can monitor certain phenomena. It was picked up and modified to serve other purposes following its abandonment.
title: legendary catalyst

name: Furina
description: Why are you just standing there with your mouth gaping? Ah, you must be stunned and at a loss for words... Understandable, it is I after all... Fontaine's most beloved star, Furina. I'm on a very tight schedule, so you're lucky to even get an appointment with me.
title: Endless Solo of Solitude

name: Splendor of Tranquil Waters
description: A scepter around which swirls pure water. In days long past, it once symbolized the highest authority over the seas.
title: legendary sword

name: Navia
description: I really wanna go traveling! I don't mind where we go, as long as I have my friends with me, hehe.
title: Helm of the Radiant Rose

name: Verdict
description: A weapon once used by a young maiden who forsook her family name, stained with the blood of enemies and loved ones both.
title: legendary claymore

name: Clorinde
description: I've faced many opponents in my duels. Most of them, I defeated. The rest surrendered. ...Hm? No. I have never lost a duel.
title: Candlebearer, Shadowhunter

name: Absolution
description: A rapier once wielded by a deceiver who had forsaken everything. In the past, it was primarily used as a tool when he had to disguise his identity.
title: legendary sword

name: Sigewinne
description: What's wrong? Don't be nervous, I'm Nurse Sigewinne from the Fortress of Meropide. Lemme take a look at you... Any pain here? What about here? ...Oh, you're not here for a checkup? Well, that's great news, phew... You're so adorable, make sure you take good care of yourself, okay? We don't want anything happening to you.
title: Wondrous Dragonheir

name: Silvershower Heartstrings
description: Legendary bow of the fairies. Whether on the stage or the battlefield, it can easily touch the hearts of the listener.
title: legendary bow

name: Emilie
description: I must admit, I'm not very good at coming up with topics to talk about. Simply put, I'm not the best conversationalist. But, if there's anything you want to share, good or bad, I'm always willing to listen.
title: A Thousand Scents Traced

name: Lumidouce Elegy
description: A magnificent polearm adorned with azure crystal. It is said to have been a certain legendary Champion Duelist's treasure — and yet, not once was it ever used.
title: legendary polearm

name: Kachina
description: Hello! I'm Kachina, a member of the Children of Echoes. I adore Grainfruits and would love to become more strong, even though I'm still not much of a fighter. Uh... I should probably save all that for later, right? Then, um... Are you hoping to go somewhere? I'm pretty familiar with these parts, so I can show you the way!
title: Mottled Gold Yet Unsmelted

name: Ororon
description: Oh, hello. I'm Ororon from the Masters of the Night-Wind. Want some vegetables?
title: Shadow of the Night-Wind

name: Mualani
description: Ever tried chasing waves before? You wanna try? Well? Well? C'mon, no time like the present! I'll help you find the closest beach.
title: Splish-Splash Wavechaser

name: Surf's Up
description: A commemorative item originally reserved for the champion of the First All-Tribe Surfing Championship. Since said tournament is currently in the preparatory stage, the prize is in temporary storage at the Leisurely Puffer, with the shop owner as its custodian.
title: legendary catalyst

name: Kinich
description: I don't believe we've met. If you'd like to request my services, please brief me on the job and state what you're willing to pay.
title: Turnfire Hunt

name: Fang of the Mountain King
description: A giant sword forged from pure turquoise. Due to its greater weight than most ordinary weapons, it was named for Kongomato the Mountain King.
title: legendary claymore

name: Xilonen
description: We should take a break after all that running around... Yeah, let's rest here for a bit.
title: Ardent Flames Forge the Soul

name: Peak Patrol Song
description: An obsidian blade of unparalleled sharpness, light as a song. It was modified by a certain artisan to come equipped with a record-playing detachable Phlogiston Device.
title: legendary sword

name: Chasca
description: Any disputes you need me to end for you? Depending on the situation, it could cost you a little dignity, a few drinks, or potentially... a round of ammo.
title: Skyborne Arbiter

name: Astral Vulture's Crimson Plumage
description: An ancient longbow crested with red feathers, a sacred relic of the Flower-Feather Clan that has been passed down from generation to generation.
title: legendary bow

name: Citlali
description: I have read the stars and seen the future through the obscuring smoke. You shall be blessed with good fortune and have the aid of powerful allies during your journey. Allow me to join you — Hey, I can be serious! Stop looking at me like that!
title: Obsidian Opalstar

name: Starcaller's Watch
description: A statue carved in the shape of an eagle, a sacred relic of the Masters of the Night-Wind that has been passed down from generation to generation.
title: legendary catalyst

name: Mavuika
description: With the flames to guide us across time, we took a land shrouded in darkness, and used our own blood and tears to forge it into a home. Now, our journey continues, and a new chapter awaits. As the current Pyro Archon, allow me, Mavuika, to light your way forward.
title: Night-Igniting Flame

name: A Thousand Blazing Suns
description: A greatsword that dazzles like the rising sun. It has witnessed the extinguishing and rekindling of innumerable suns.
title: legendary claymore

name: Varessa
description: Do you want to know where the milk comes from? I eat for three.
title: cow

name: Iansan
description: 100 pricks, 100 squats, 100 pull-ups, 10km running daily and back will not pain.
title: pumped-up kid

name: Tartaglia
description: This place is pretty dead... By which I mean, there's nothing to kill.
title: Childe, Fatui Harbinger

name: Polar Star
description: A pristine bow that is as sharp as the glaciers of the far north.
title: legendary bow

name: Arlecchino
description: Flames course through my body like blood... This may be nothing but a figure of speech to some. But for me, it's the harsh reality of my existence.
title: Dire Balemoon, The Knave, Fatui Harbinger

name: Crimson Moon's Semblance
description: A keen-edged weapon, luster dazzling as the crimson moon. It is said that an ancient dynasty once regarded it as a ritual object that could bridge two worlds, but none still remember the beliefs and ceremonies of that bygone age.
title: legendary bloody polearm
